title: Understanding Culturally Responsive Care
text: Culturally responsive care involves recognizing and integrating an individual's cultural beliefs and practices into their healthcare plan. This approach ensures that healthcare is respectful and tailored to the cultural needs of the patient.

hintAnswer: when an individual’s cultural beliefs are integrated into their health care
title: Identifying Culturally Responsive Care
text: Which of the following best describes culturally responsive care?
choices: when an individual’s cultural beliefs are integrated into their health care
set of beliefs, attitudes, and practices shared by a group of people or community that is accepted, followed, and passed down to other members of the group
